titleStmt.title: A declaration of the English army now in scotland. [sic] To the people of Scotland, especially those among them, that know and fear the Lord; we the officers and souldiers of the English army do send greeting.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: From the Leaguer at Muscleborough, August. 1. 1650.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
